asset.hookText:
Alex Gafford, Chief Engineer and Director of Research and Development at Char-Broil, demonstrates what the new standard in outdoor cooking, TRU-Infrared, really means. If you would like to know more about Char-Broil TRU-Infrared technology, please visit http://live.charbroil.com/what-is-tru-infrared
